column5: Start and disrupt business for good.Are you ready to change business for good and join Europe's most vibrant startup ecosystem? Whether you are an aspiring entrepreneur, corporate innovator, venture capitalist, or innovation consultant the Master in Innovation and Entrepreneurship will help you embark on an exciting entrepreneurial career. This program introduces you to the state-of-the-art in creating and transforming modern businesses through an intensive, interdisciplinary curriculum.In collaboration withÂ Vali Berlin, ESMT's Entrepreneurship Hub, the Master in Innovation and Entrepreneurship program offers a unique learning experience that combines theory and practice.
